description.narrative: The National Greenhouse Gas Abatement Strategy (NGHGAS), 2008-2018 developed as part of the Second National Communication, identified six priority areas for action. Of these priorities, Government of Samoa has identified the establishment of a Biomass Gasification Pilot Project as a priority for action under the Partnership. The Partnership will provide funding for technical assistance to assess the feasibility and then construct a biomass gasification plant. The are five project components: establishment of gasification plant; operation of plant; supply of biomass; gasification products; and project management. The total value of this initiative is $0.3 million to be expensed during the 2009-10 financial year.
